keyMoments.title: Intense Duel with Ryuma Continues
keyMoments.description: Zoro battles evenly with the legendary samurai Ryuma in Hogback's laboratory, demonstrating his mastery of the three-sword style.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's growth as a swordsman capable of matching a legendary warrior.
keyMoments.quote: Oh, I'm taking it. I'm about to cut you down and wrench it from your cold, dead, body.

keyMoments.title: Debuts Hiryu: Kaen
keyMoments.description: Zoro unleashes his new one-sword style technique, Hiryu: Kaen (Flying Dragon Blaze), a powerful fire-based attack that defeats Ryuma.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the debut of one of Zoro's most iconic and powerful techniques, which becomes crucial in future battles including against Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Ryuma
keyMoments.description: Zoro successfully defeats the legendary zombie samurai Ryuma, proving himself as a superior swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory that earns Zoro the legendary blade Shusui and demonstrates his continuous growth.
keyMoments.quote: I wish I could have met you before you died.

keyMoments.title: Receives Shusui
keyMoments.description: Ryuma passes the legendary black blade Shusui to Zoro, recognizing him as a worthy successor to wield the sword.
keyMoments.significance: Zoro acquires one of the 21 Great Grade swords, replacing his broken Yubashiri and gaining a weapon that will serve him until the Wano Arc.

abilities.description: A one-sword style technique where Zoro jumps high into the air with one sword wielded in one hand (with the other hand gripping the wrist for support) and slashes his opponent, who then bursts into flames.

relationships.description: Zoro duels Ryuma in an honorable sword fight, showing mutual respect as warriors.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro defeats Ryuma and receives Shusui, with both swordsmen acknowledging each other's skill.

reveals.information: Mastered the fire-based one-sword technique Hiryu: Kaen
Acquired the legendary black blade Shusui, one of the 21 Great Grade swords

keyMoments.title: Displays Fencing Techniques
keyMoments.description: Ryuma demonstrates several fencing-style sword techniques including Aubade Coup Droit, Prelude: Au Fer, Gavotte Bond en Avant, and Polka Remise.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Ryuma's unique blend of Eastern and Western swordsmanship that made him legendary.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Ryuma is defeated by Zoro's Hiryu: Kaen technique and acknowledges Zoro as the superior swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: The legendary samurai recognizes a worthy successor, setting up the passing of Shusui.
keyMoments.quote: It looks to me that you already have three swords.

keyMoments.title: Passes Shusui to Zoro
keyMoments.description: Ryuma sheathes and throws Shusui to Zoro, entrusting the legendary blade to him.
keyMoments.significance: The transfer of Wano's national treasure to Zoro, recognizing him as a worthy wielder.

keyMoments.title: Zombie Body Disintegrates
keyMoments.description: After passing Shusui to Zoro, Ryuma's zombie body collapses in flames and disintegrates, finally putting the legendary samurai's corpse to rest.
keyMoments.significance: Grants peace to Ryuma's desecrated remains and frees Brook's shadow.

abilities.description: A fencing-style sword technique used by Ryuma.
A fencing-style sword technique used by Ryuma.
A fencing-style sword technique used by Ryuma.
A fencing-style sword technique used by Ryuma.

relationships.description: Engaged in an honorable duel with Zoro, showing mutual respect as swordsmen.

evolutionMoments.description: Acknowledges Zoro's superiority and passes Shusui to him before his final rest.

relationships.description: Ryuma's zombie body was animated using Brook's stolen shadow.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryuma's defeat frees Brook's shadow to return to its rightful owner.

reveals.information: Zombie body finally destroyed, granting rest to Ryuma's remains

keyMoments.title: Shadow Returns
keyMoments.description: Brook's shadow is finally freed from Ryuma's body and returns to its rightful owner, allowing him to walk in daylight again after years of confinement to darkness.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves one of Brook's major conflicts and removes a critical weakness, setting up his ability to join the Straw Hat crew.

keyMoments.title: Protected by Franky
keyMoments.description: While injured, Brook is guarded by Franky throughout the episode, demonstrating the growing bonds between Brook and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's acceptance of Brook, foreshadowing his eventual official joining.

relationships.description: Brook's shadow was stolen and placed in Ryuma's zombie body by Gecko Moria.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryuma's defeat frees Brook's shadow to return to him.

relationships.description: Franky protects the injured Brook during the episode.

reveals.information: Regained his shadow, allowing him to walk in sunlight without disintegrating
